title: $:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban
author: Simon Huber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/config/kanban/items/align-right":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/align-right","text":"no"},"$:/config/kanban/items/border-radius":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/border-radius","text":"4px"},"$:/config/kanban/items/connection-selector":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/connection-selector","text":".tc-board-column-items"},"$:/config/kanban/items/container-class":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/container-class","text":"tc-board-column-items"},"$:/config/kanban/items/drag-container":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/drag-container","text":".tc-drag-container"},"$:/config/kanban/items/dragsort-heuristics-interval":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/dragsort-heuristics-interval","text":"0"},"$:/config/kanban/items/item-class":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/item-class","text":"tc-board-item"},"$:/config/kanban/items/margin-top":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/margin-top","text":"0.5rem"},"$:/config/kanban/items/margin":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/margin","text":"0.5rem"},"$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontsize":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontsize","text":"0.9rem"},"$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontweight":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontweight","text":"300"},"$:/config/kanban/items/text-lineheight":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/items/text-lineheight","text":"1.1rem"},"$:/config/kanban/align-right":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/align-right","text":"no"},"$:/config/kanban/animations":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/animations","text":"yes"},"$:/config/kanban/headers/border-radius":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/headers/border-radius","text":"0.2rem"},"$:/config/kanban/column-width":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/column-width","text":"350px"},"$:/config/kanban/connection-selector":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/connection-selector","text":".tc-board"},"$:/config/kanban/container-class":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/container-class","text":"tc-board"},"$:/config/kanban/drag-autoscroll-axis":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/drag-autoscroll-axis","text":"xy"},"$:/config/kanban/drag-container":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/drag-container","text":".tc-drag-container"},"$:/config/kanban/dragsort-action":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/dragsort-action","text":"swap"},"$:/config/kanban/horizontal":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/horizontal","text":"no"},"$:/config/kanban/item-class":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/item-class","text":"tc-board-column"},"$:/config/kanban/open-links-outside":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/open-links-outside","text":"yes"},"$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links":{"title":"$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links","text":"no"},"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnEditTemplate":{"title":"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnEditTemplate","text":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnEditTemplate"},"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnTemplate":{"title":"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnTemplate","text":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnTemplate"},"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemEditTemplate":{"title":"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemEditTemplate","text":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemEditTemplate"},"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemTemplate":{"title":"$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemTemplate","text":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemTemplate"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/config","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance","caption":"Muuri-Kanban","text":"<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/animations" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"> Enable animations for toolbar buttons</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/horizontal" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Enable horizontal scrolling for Kanbans</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/show-toolbar" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Show the items-toolbar</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/show-tags" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Show tags on items</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/match-header-color" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Show the item-borders in the color of the column header</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/auto-save-wiki" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no" checkactions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/auto-save-wiki" text="yes"/>""" uncheckactions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/auto-save-wiki" text="no"/>"""> Enable ~AutoSaving</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Show titles as links</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/kanban/open-links-outside" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"> Open links in the Story River</$checkbox>

!!! Configure the width of Kanban columns when horizontal scrolling is enabled

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/column-width" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the top margin of items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/margin-top" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the right/left margin of items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/margin" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the text-fontsize of items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontsize" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the text-lineheight of items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/text-lineheight" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the text-fontweight of items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontweight" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the border-radius of the items

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/items/border-radius" tag="input" default=""/>

!!! Configure the border-radius of the column-headers

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/kanban/headers/border-radius" tag="input" default=""/>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/icons/kanban":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/icons/kanban","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"<svg height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M6 5H3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1v12c0 .55.45 1 1 1h3c.55 0 1-.45 1-1V6c0-.55-.45-1-1-1zm14 0h-3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1v12c0 .55.45 1 1 1h3c.55 0 1-.45 1-1V6c0-.55-.45-1-1-1zm-7 0h-3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1v12c0 .55.45 1 1 1h3c.55 0 1-.45 1-1V6c0-.55-.45-1-1-1z"/></svg>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/license","text":"!!! It needs the Muuri ~StoryView plugin installed in order to work"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/css":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","muuri-tiddler-width":"1","text":"\define set-board-column-width()
<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/horizontal}match[no]]" emptyMessage="""
	[data-board-container-title="$(cssEscapedTitle)$"] .tc-board-column {
		width: {{$:/config/kanban/column-width}};
	}
""">
	[data-board-container-title="$(cssEscapedTitle)$"] .tc-board-column {
		width: calc(100% / $(count)$);
	}
</$list>
\end
.tc-board-container {
	position: relative;
	height: 75vh;
}

<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/horizontal}match[yes]]">
	.tc-board-container {
		overflow-x: auto;
	}
</$list>

hr.tc-kanban-line {
	border: 0;
	height: 1px;
	background: <<colour muted-foreground>>;
}

<$list filter="[all[tiddlers]prefix[$:/state/popup/more-]limit[1]]">

.tc-board-container {
	z-index: -1;
}

</$list>

.tc-kanban-droppable {
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	font-size: 1.5rem;
	min-height: 2.2rem;
	border: 0.2rem dashed transparent;
	border-radius: 4px;
}

.tc-kanban-droppable button.tc-btn-invisible {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground>>;
	float: right;
}

.tc-kanban-droppable button.tc-btn-invisible:hover {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

.tc-dragover .tc-kanban-droppable {
	border-color: <<colour dropzone-background>>;
}

.tc-board {
	position: relative;
	display: flex;
	height: 100%;
	min-width: 100%;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
	max-height: 100%;
	min-height: 100%;
}

.tc-board-column {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	top: 0;
	min-height: 100%;
	z-index: 1;
}

<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]has[list]]" variable="listItem">
	<$vars count={{{ [list<listItem>count[]] }}} cssEscapedTitle={{{ [<listItem>escapecss[]] }}}>

		<<set-board-column-width>>

	</$vars>
</$list>

.tc-board-item-toolbar {
	float: right;
}

.tc-board-item-toolbar button.tc-btn-invisible {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground>>;
}

.tc-board-item-toolbar button.tc-btn-invisible:hover {
	fill: <<colour tiddler-controls-foreground-hover>>;
}

.tc-board-column.tc-muuri-releasing {
	z-index: 2;
}
.tc-board-column.tc-muuri-dragging {
	z-index: 3;
	cursor: move;
}

.tc-board-column-content {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	min-height: 100%;
	padding: 0.5rem;
}

.tc-board-column-header {
	position: relative;
	display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
	align-items: center;
	height: 2.5rem;
	width: 100%;
	min-height: 2.5rem;
	font-size: 1rem;
	line-height: 2.5rem;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	padding-left: 1rem;
	padding-right: 0.5rem;
	text-align: center;
	font-weight: 700;
	font-style: italic;
	background: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
	color: <<colour foreground>>;
	border-radius: {{$:/config/kanban/headers/border-radius}};
	border: 0.2rem solid <<colour foreground>>;
}
.tc-board-column-header.tc-board-column-edit-header {
	height: auto;
	border: 0.2rem solid <<colour foreground>>;
}

.tc-board-column-header input:not([type="color"]) {
	border: 1px solid <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	border-radius: 2px;
	width: 80%;
}
.tc-board-column-header-wrapper {
	position: relative;
	display: flex;
	font-size: 1rem;
	font-weight: 700;
	height: auto;
}

.tc-board-column-title {
	white-space: nowrap;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	overflow: hidden;
	outline: none;
	flex-grow: 1;
	text-align: left;
	margin-left: -2rem;
	padding-left: 2rem;
}

.tc-board-column-action {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: center;
	align-items: center;
	position: relative;
	margin: 0;
	border: 0;
	width: 2rem;
	height: 2rem;
	min-width: 2rem;
	min-height: 2rem;
	padding: 0.3rem;
	border-radius: 1rem;
	white-space: nowrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	-ms-touch-action: manipulation;
	touch-action: manipulation;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/animations}!match[no]]">

.tc-board-column-action {
	transform: rotateZ(0deg);
	transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

.tc-board-column-action:hover {
	transform: rotateZ(180deg);
}
.tc-board-column-action.tc-edit, .tc-board-column-action.tc-delete {
	transition: transform 0.4s ease-in-out;
}
.tc-board-column-action.tc-edit:hover, .tc-board-column-action.tc-delete:hover {
	transform: rotateZ(360deg);
}

</$list>

.tc-board-column-action:focus {
	outline: 0;
}

.tc-board-column-action svg {
	flex-grow: 1;
	pointer-events: none;
}

.tc-board-column-items-container {
	position: relative;
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	flex-grow: 1;
	overflow: hidden;
	overflow-y: auto;
}
.tc-board-column-items {
	position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	top: 0;
	width: 100%;
	min-height: 100%;
	border-bottom: 1.5rem solid transparent;
}

.tc-board-item {
	position: absolute;
	width: calc(100% - (2 * {{$:/config/kanban/items/margin}}));
	margin-top: {{$:/config/kanban/items/margin-top}};
	margin-right: {{$:/config/kanban/items/margin}};
	margin-left: {{$:/config/kanban/items/margin}};
	margin-bottom: 0;
	z-index: 10;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-releasing {
	z-index: 11;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-dragging {
	z-index: 12;
	cursor: move;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-hidden {
	z-index: 8;
}
.tc-board-item.muuri-item-placeholder {
	z-index: 9;
	margin: 0;
	opacity: 0.7;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-active {
	z-index: 13;
}

.tc-board-item img, .tc-board-item hr {
	pointer-events: none;
	max-width: 100%;
}

.tc-board-item svg {
	max-width: 100%;
}

.tc-board-item .tc-tags-wrapper .tc-tag-list-item .tc-tag-label {
	font-size: 0.75em;
}

.tc-board-item .tc-tags-wrapper .tc-tag-list-item .tc-drop-down {
	font-size: 0.75em;
	min-width: 100%;
}

.tc-board-item .tc-tiddler-title-icon svg {
	height: 1.5rem;
	width: 1.5rem;
}

.tc-board-item .tc-edit-tags input.tc-edit-texteditor {
	-webkit-box-shadow: none;
	-moz-box-shadow: none;
	box-shadow: none;
	border: none;
	outline: none;
}

.tc-board-item .tc-edit-texteditor {
	margin: 4px 0 4px 0;
}

.tc-board-item input.tc-edit-texteditor {
	padding: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
}

.tc-board-item-content {
	position: relative;
	padding: 0.5rem;
	background: <<colour tiddler-background>>;
	border: 0.2rem solid <<colour tag-background>>;
	color: <<colour foreground>>;
	border-radius: {{$:/config/kanban/items/border-radius}};
	font-size: 1rem;
	font-weight: 400;
}
.tc-board-item-content input:not(input[type="checkbox"]) {
	width: 100%;
	border: 1px solid <<colour muted-foreground>>;
	border-radius: 2px;
	margin-bottom: 2px;
}
.tc-board-item-content input + br + div, .tc-board-item-content .tc-edit-tags + div, .tc-board-item-content input + br + div > .CodeMirror, .tc-board-item-content textarea {
	width: 100%;
	border-radius: 2px;
}
.tc-board-item-content .tc-edit-tags {
	margin-bottom: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
}
.tc-board-item.muuri-item-placeholder .tc-board-item-content {
	border-style: dashed;
	border-color: <<colour primary>>;
}
.tc-board-item.editing .tc-board-item-content {
	border-color: <<colour primary>>;
}
.tc-board-item:focus-within .tc-board-item-content {
	border: 0.2rem solid <<colour primary>>;
	padding: 0.5rem;
}
.tc-board-item-title {
	font-size: 1rem;
	line-height: 1.2;
	word-break: break-word;
	caret-color: <<colour primary>>;
	outline: none;
	outline-offset: 0.5rem;
	min-height: calc(1rem * 1.2);
}
.tc-board-item-text {
	margin-top: 0.5rem;
	font-size: {{$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontsize}};
	font-weight: {{$:/config/kanban/items/text-fontweight}};
	line-height: {{$:/config/kanban/items/text-lineheight}};
}
.tc-board-item-handle {
	position: absolute;
	left: -0.25rem;
	right: -0.25rem;
	top: -0.25rem;
	bottom: -0.25rem;
	border-radius: 0.5rem;
	cursor: move;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-editing .tc-board-item-handle {
	display: none;
}
.tc-board-item-action {
	position: absolute;
	display: flex;
	width: 1.5rem;
	height: 1.5rem;
	padding: 0rem;
	opacity: 0;
	transform: scale(0, 0);
	transition: transform 0.3s 0s ease-out, opacity 0.3s 0s linear;
}
.tc-board-item-action button.tc-btn-invisible:focus {
	outline: 0;
}
.tc-board-item-action.tc-edit {
	right: -1.1rem;
	top: -0.9rem;
}
.tc-board-item:focus-within .tc-board-item-action.tc-edit {
	right: -1.1rem;
	top: -0.9rem;
}
.tc-board-item-action.tc-delete {
	left: -0.6rem;
	bottom: -0.6rem;
}
.tc-board-item:focus-within .tc-board-item-action.tc-delete {
	left: -0.6rem;
	bottom: -0.6rem;
}
.tc-board-item-action.tc-close {
	right: -1.1rem;
	bottom: -0.6rem;
}
.tc-board-item:focus-within .tc-board-item-action.tc-close {
	right: -1.1rem;
	bottom: -0.6rem;
}
.tc-board-item-action.tc-link {
	top: -0.9rem;
	left: -0.5rem;
}
.tc-board-item:focus-within .tc-board-item-action.tc-link {
	top: -0.9rem;
	left: -0.5rem;
}

.tc-board-item.tc-editing .tc-board-item-action,
.tc-board-item:hover .tc-board-item-action,
.tc-board-column-header-wrapper:hover .tc-board-item-action,
.tc-board-item:focus .tc-board-item-action,
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-dragging .tc-board-item-action,
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-releasing .tc-board-item-action {
	opacity: 1;
	transform: scale(1, 1);
	transition: transform 0.2s 0.1s ease, opacity 0.2s 0.1s linear;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-editing .tc-board-item-action:hover,
.tc-board-item:hover .tc-board-item-action:hover,
.tc-board-item:focus .tc-board-item-action:hover,
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-dragging .tc-board-item-action:hover,
.tc-board-item.tc-muuri-releasing .tc-board-item-action:hover {
	transform: scale(1.2, 1.2);
}
.tc-board-item-action-icon {
	flex-grow: 1;
	pointer-events: none;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-editing .tc-board-item-action-icon.tc-icon-edit,
.tc-board-item-action-icon.tc-icon-save {
	display: none;
}
.tc-board-item.tc-editing .tc-board-item-action-icon.tc-icon-save {
	display: block;
}
"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/Buttons/new-kanban":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/Buttons/new-kanban","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","text":"\define new-kanban-actions()
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle="New Kanban" $savetitle="$:/temp/new-kanban" text="{{||$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanTemplate}}" muuri-tiddler-width="1"/>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{$:/temp/new-kanban}}/>
\end
\whitespace trim
<$button actions=<<new-kanban-actions>> tooltip="new kanban" aria-label="new kanban" class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>>
<$list filter="[<tv-config-toolbar-icons>match[yes]]">
{{$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/icons/kanban}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[<tv-config-toolbar-text>match[yes]]">
<span class="tc-btn-text"><$text text=" new kanban"/></span>
</$list>
</$button>
"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnEditTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnEditTemplate","text":"\whitespace trim
\define get-history() $:/HistoryList/Kanban/$(currentTiddler)$
\define get-styles() background-color: $(bgColor)$; border-color: $(bgColor)$; fill: $(foregroundColor)$;
\define get-item-styles() border-color: $(bgColor)$;
\define get-foreground-color-inner(colour,colourA,colourB)
<$macrocall $name="contrastcolour" target="""$colour$""" colourA="""$colourA$""" colourB="""$colourB$"""/>
\end
\define get-foreground-color(palette)
<$macrocall $name="get-foreground-color-inner" colour={{!!color}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/>
\end
<$vars bgColor={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}}>
	<$wikify name="foregroundColor" text="""<$macrocall $name="get-foreground-color" palette=<<palette>>/>""">
		<div class="tc-board-column">
			<div class="tc-board-column-content">
				<div class="tc-board-column-header-wrapper">
					<div class="tc-board-column-header tc-board-column-edit-header" style=<<get-styles>>>
						<div class="tc-board-column-title">
							<$keyboard key="((save-tiddler))" message="tm-save-tiddler">
								<$keyboard key="((cancel-edit-tiddler))" message="tm-cancel-tiddler">
									<$edit-text field="draft.title" tag="input" placeholder=" title" focus="true" tabindex="1"/><br>
									<$edit-text field="caption" tag="input" placeholder=" caption" tabindex="1"/><br>
									<$edit-text field="drop-actions" tag="input" placeholder=" drop-actions" tabindex="1"/><br>
									<$edit-text field="color" tag="input" tabindex="1"/>
								</$keyboard>
							</$keyboard>
						</div>
						<div style="position: absolute; right: 0; top: 0;">
							<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-edit" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip="save column" aria-label="save column">
								<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/>
								{{$:/core/images/save-button}}
							</$button>
							<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-delete" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip="cancel editing" aria-label="cancel editing">
								<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-cancel-tiddler"/>
								{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}
							</$button>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				<$navigator story=<<currentTiddler>> history=<<get-history>>>
					<div class="tc-board-column-items-container tc-scrollable-element">
						<$set name="tv-muuri-story-list" value=<<currentTiddler>>>
							<$set name="tv-muuri-drop-actions" value={{!!drop-actions}}>
								<div class="tc-board-column-items">
									<$list filter="[list<currentTiddler>]" storyview="muuri" template={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemTemplate}} editTemplate={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemEditTemplate}} storyViewConfig="$:/config/kanban/items/"/>
								</div>
							</$set>
						</$set>
					</div>
				</$navigator>
			</div>
		</div>
	</$wikify>
</$vars>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanColumnTemplate","text":"\whitespace trim
\define get-column-tooltip(prefix) $prefix$ column $(currentTiddler)$
\define get-history() $:/HistoryList/KanbanColumn/$(currentTiddler)$
\define get-classes() tc-board-column $(currentTiddler)$
\define get-board-column-styles() width: calc(100% / $(amount)$);
\define get-styles() background-color: $(bgColor)$; border-color: $(bgColor)$; color: $(foregroundColor)$; fill: $(foregroundColor)$;
\define get-item-styles() border-color: $(bgColor)$;
\define get-foreground-color-inner(colour,colourA,colourB)
<$macrocall $name="contrastcolour" target="""$colour$""" colourA="""$colourA$""" colourB="""$colourB$"""/>
\end
\define get-foreground-color(palette)
<$macrocall $name="get-foreground-color-inner" colour={{!!color}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/>
\end
\define get-drop-actions()
<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]">
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<actionTiddler>> $field="kanban-history" $subfilter={{{ [<prefix>addsuffix<now YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX>addsuffix[,]addsuffix[column: ]addsuffix<currentTiddler>addsuffix[,moved]addsuffix<suffix>] }}}/>
	$(dropActions)$
</$vars>
\end
<$vars bgColor={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}}>
	<$wikify name="foregroundColor" text="""<$macrocall $name="get-foreground-color" palette=<<palette>>/>""">
		<$navigator story=<<currentTiddler>> history=<<get-history>> openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
			<div class=<<get-classes>>>
				<div class="tc-board-column-content">
					<$droppable actions="""<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]"><$action-listops $tiddler=<<actionTiddler>> $field="kanban-history" $subfilter={{{ [<prefix>addsuffix<now YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX>addsuffix[,]addsuffix[column: ]addsuffix<currentTiddler>addsuffix[,added]addsuffix<suffix>] }}}/></$vars><$action-navigate $to=<<actionTiddler>>/>""">
						<div class="tc-board-column-header-wrapper">
							<div class="tc-board-column-header" style=<<get-styles>>>
								<div class="tc-board-column-title">
									<$list filter="[{!!caption}!match[]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="""
										<$transclude field="title"/>
										""">
										<$transclude field="caption"/>
									</$list>
								</div>
								<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-add" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip="new item" aria-label="new item">
									<!--<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler"/>-->
									<$vars prefix="[[" suffix="]]">
										<$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/language/DefaultNewTiddlerTitle}} kanban-history={{{ [<prefix>addsuffix<now YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX>addsuffix[,]addsuffix[column: ]addsuffix<currentTiddler>addsuffix[,created]addsuffix<suffix>] }}}>
											<$action-navigate $to=<<createTiddler-title>>/>
											<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<createTiddler-title>>/>
										</$action-createtiddler>
									</$vars>
									{{$:/core/images/new-button}}
								</$button>
								<$navigator story=<<tv-muuri-story-list>> history=<<tv-muuri-history-list>>>
									<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-edit" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip=<<get-column-tooltip "edit">> aria-label=<<get-column-tooltip "edit">>>
										<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler"/>
										{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
									</$button>
									<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-add" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip=<<get-column-tooltip "remove">> aria-label=<<get-column-tooltiop "remove">>>
										<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
										{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
									</$button>
									<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-delete" style=<<get-styles>> tooltip=<<get-column-tooltip "delete">> aria-label=<<get-column-tooltip "delete">>>
										<$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to delete the column?">
											<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler"/>
										</$action-confirm>
										{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
									</$button>
								</$navigator>
							</div>
						</div>
					</$droppable>
					<div class="tc-board-column-items-container tc-scrollable-element">
						<$set name="tv-muuri-story-list" value=<<currentTiddler>>>
							<$set name="dropActions" value={{!!drop-actions}}>
								<$set name="tv-muuri-drop-actions" value=<<get-drop-actions>>>
									<div class="tc-board-column-items">
										<$list filter="[list<currentTiddler>]" storyview="muuri" template={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemTemplate}} editTemplate={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ItemEditTemplate}} storyViewConfig="$:/config/kanban/items/"/>
									</div>
								</$set>
							</$set>
						</$set>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</$navigator>
	</$wikify>
</$vars>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemEditTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemEditTemplate","text":"\define save-button()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="save item" aria-label="save item">
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/>
	{{$:/core/images/save-button}}
</$button>
\end
\define cancel-button()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="cancel editing" aria-label="cancel editing">
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-cancel-tiddler"/>
	{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}
</$button>
\end
<div class="tc-board-item">
	<$set name="borderStyle" value=<<get-item-styles>>>
		<div class="tc-board-item-content" style={{{ [{$:/config/kanban/items/match-header-color}match[yes]then<borderStyle>else[]] }}}>
			<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-toolbar}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
				<div class="tc-board-item-toolbar">
					<<save-button>>
					<<cancel-button>>
				</div>
			</$list>
			<div class="tc-board-item-title">
				<$keyboard key="((save-tiddler))" message="tm-save-tiddler">
					<$keyboard key="((cancel-edit-tiddler))" message="tm-cancel-tiddler">
						<$edit-text field="draft.title" tag="input" placeholder=" title" focus="true" tabindex="1" cancelPopups="yes"/><br>
						<$edit-text field="caption" tag="input" placeholder=" caption" tabindex="1" cancelPopups="yes"/><br>
						<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-tags}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
							{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}
						</$list>
						<$edit field="text" default="" placeholder=" text" tabindex="1" cancelPopups="yes"/>
					</$keyboard>
				</$keyboard>
			</div>
			<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-toolbar}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
				<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-edit">
					<<save-button>>
				</div>
				<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-close">
					<<cancel-button>>
				</div>
			</$list>
		</div>
	</$set>
</div>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanItemTemplate","text":"\define get-item-tooltip(prefix) $prefix$ item $(currentTiddler)$
\define title-styles() fill: $(foregroundColor)$;
\define edit-button()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<<get-item-tooltip "edit">> aria-label=<<get-item-tooltip "edit">>>
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler"/>
	{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
</$button>
\end
\define close-button()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<<get-item-tooltip "close">> aria-label=<<get-item-tooltip "close">>>
	<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
	{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
</$button>
\end
\define delete-button()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<<get-item-tooltip "delete">> aria-label=<<get-item-tooltip "delete">>>
	<$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to delete the card?">
		<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler"/>
	</$action-confirm>
	{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
</$button>
\end
\define link-button()
<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<<get-item-tooltip "open">> aria-label=<<get-item-tooltip "open">>>
		<$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/>
		{{$:/core/images/link}}
	</$button>
</$navigator>
\end
\define get-kanban-history-info-state() $:/state/kanban-history-list/$(currentTiddler)$
\define kanban-history-list()
<$set name="kanbanHistoryInfoState" value=<<get-kanban-history-info-state>>>
	<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<kanbanHistoryInfoState>> text="" default="">
		<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-kanban-history-button" tooltip="kanban history" aria-label="kanban history" setTitle=<<kanbanHistoryInfoState>> setTo="yes">
			{{$:/core/images/info-button}}
		</$button><br>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<kanbanHistoryInfoState>> text="" default="">
		<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-selected tc-kanban-history-button" tooltip="kanban history" aria-label="kanban history" set=<<kanbanHistoryInfoState>> setTo="">
			{{$:/core/images/info-button}}
		</$button><br>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" stateTitle=<<kanbanHistoryInfoState>> class="tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes">
		<$set name="historyList" value={{!!kanban-history}}>
			<$list filter="[enlist<historyList>]" variable="currentHistory">
				<$set name="previousHistory" value={{{ [enlist<historyList>before<currentHistory>] }}}>
					<$set name="timestamp" value={{{ [<currentHistory>splitbefore[,]removesuffix[,]] }}}>
						<$set name="column" value={{{ [<currentHistory>removeprefix<timestamp>removeprefix[,column: ]splitbefore[,]removesuffix[,]] }}}>
							<$set name="addedCreatedOrMoved" value={{{ [<currentHistory>removeprefix<timestamp>removeprefix[,column: ]removeprefix<column>removeprefix[,]] }}}>
								<$list filter="[<addedCreatedOrMoved>match[added]]" variable="ignore">
									<$text text={{{ [<timestamp>format:date[YYYY 0MM 0DD - 0hh:0mm:0ss]] }}}/> - <$text text="added to: "/><$text text=<<column>>/><br>
								</$list>
								<$list filter="[<addedCreatedOrMoved>match[created]]" variable="ignore">
									<$text text={{{ [<timestamp>format:date[YYYY 0MM 0DD - 0hh:0mm:0ss]] }}}/> - <$text text="created at: "/><$text text=<<column>>/><br>
								</$list>
								<$list filter="[<addedCreatedOrMoved>match[moved]]" variable="ignore">
									<$set name="fromColumnTimestamp" value={{{ [<previousHistory>splitbefore[,]removesuffix[,]] }}}>
										<$set name="fromColumn" value={{{ [<previousHistory>removeprefix<fromColumnTimestamp>removeprefix[,column: ]splitbefore[,]removesuffix[,]] }}}>
											<$set name="timestampDiff" value={{{ [<timestamp>subtract<fromColumnTimestamp>] }}}>
												<$text text={{{ [<timestamp>format:date[YYYY 0MM 0DD - 0hh:0mm:0ss]] }}}/> - <$text text="moved from: "/><$text text=<<fromColumn>>/><$text text=" to: "/><$text text=<<column>>/><br>
											</$set>
										</$set>
									</$set>
								</$list>
							</$set>
						</$set>
					</$set>
				</$set>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	</$reveal>
</$set>
\end
<div class="tc-board-item">
	<$eventcatcher events="dblclick" actions-dblclick="""<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<currentTiddler>>/>""">
		<$set name="borderStyle" value=<<get-item-styles>>>
			<div class="tc-board-item-content" style={{{ [{$:/config/kanban/items/match-header-color}match[yes]then<borderStyle>else[]] }}}>
				<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-toolbar}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
					<div class="tc-board-item-toolbar">
						<<edit-button>>
						<<close-button>>
						<<delete-button>>
						<<link-button>>
					</div>
				</$list>
				<div class="tc-board-item-title">
					<$set name="foregroundColor" value={{!!color}}>
						<$list filter="[all[current]has[icon]] ~[[$:/config/DefaultTiddlerIcon]has[text]]">
							<span class="tc-tiddler-title-icon" style=<<title-styles>>>
								<$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}>
									<$transclude tiddler={{$:/config/DefaultTiddlerIcon}}/>
								</$transclude>
							</span>
						</$list>
					</$set>
					<$list filter="[{!!caption}!match[]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="""
						<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
							<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
								<$link><$transclude field="title"/></$link>
							</$navigator>
						</$list>
						<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
							<$transclude field="title"/>
						</$list>
						""">
						<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
							<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
								<$link><$transclude field="caption"/></$link>
							</$navigator>
						</$list>
						<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/titles-as-links}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
							<$transclude field="caption"/>
						</$list>
					</$list>
					<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-tags}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
						<div class="tc-tags-wrapper">
							<$list filter="[all[current]tags[]]" storyview="pop" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate"/>
						</div>
					</$list>
					<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/open-links-outside}match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
						<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
							<div class="tc-board-item-text">
								<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>get[text]!match[]]" variable="ignore">
									<$transclude mode="block"/>
								</$list>
								<<kanban-history-list>>
							</div>
						</$navigator>
					</$list>
					<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/open-links-outside}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
						<div class="tc-board-item-text">
							<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>get[text]!match[]]" variable="ignore">
								<$transclude mode="block"/>
							</$list>
							<<kanban-history-list>>
						</div>
					</$list>
				</div>
				<$list filter="[{$:/config/kanban/items/show-toolbar}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
					<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-edit">
						<<edit-button>>
					</div>
					<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-close">
						<<close-button>>
					</div>
					<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-delete">
						<<delete-button>>
					</div>
					<div class="tc-board-item-action tc-link">
						<<link-button>>
					</div>
				</$list>
			</div>
		</$set>
	</$eventcatcher>
</div>"},"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/BTC/Muuri-Kanban/ui/KanbanTemplate","text":"\define get-history-list() $:/HistoryList/Kanban/$(currentTiddler)$
\whitespace trim
<$navigator story=<<currentTiddler>> history=<<get-history-list>> openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
	<div class="tc-board-container tc-scrollable-element" data-board-container-title=<<currentTiddler>>>
		<div class="tc-board">
			<$vars tv-muuri-story-list=<<currentTiddler>> tv-muuri-history-list=<<get-history-list>>>
				<$list filter="[list<currentTiddler>]" storyview="muuri" template={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnTemplate}} editTemplate={{$:/config/muuri/kanban/ColumnEditTemplate}} storyViewConfig="$:/config/kanban/"/>
			</$vars>
		</div>
	</div>
	<$droppable actions="""<$action-navigate $to=<<actionTiddler>>/>""">
		<div class="tc-kanban-droppable">
			<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-board-column-action tc-add" tooltip="new column" aria-label="new column">
				<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler"/>
				{{$:/core/images/new-button}}
			</$button>
		</div>
	</$droppable>
</$navigator>"}}}
